attributes.action: standardise prescription charges and eyesight tests throughout Great Britain.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
In England, a prescription charge is currently set at £7.20, whilst in Scotland, it is currently set at £4.00 and due to be phased out completely over the next few years.
In England, an eyesight test costs £20+, whilst in Scotland, this is free.
Therefore, please standardise these charges throughout Great Britain.
